basics.name: Xueshan Wang
basics.label: Junior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Verderia NGO
work.summary: Managing and maintaining the organization's WordPress website while implementing performance optimizations through CloudFlare and ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.
highlights: Implemented CloudFlare for improved website performance and security
Managed WordPress site maintenance and content updates
Successfully configured and maintained DNS settings
responsibilities: Developed and maintained the organization's WordPress website
Managed domain registration and DNS configuration through CloudFlare
Provided technical support and WordPress solutions for day-to-day operations
Implemented website updates and security patches
Collaborated with team members to ensure website content alignment with goals
achievements: Enhanced website security and performance through CloudFlare integration

work.name: LotusHabits
work.summary: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop responsive web applications using React and Redux, with a focus on enhancing user experience through improved content rendering and Firebase integration.
highlights: Implemented advanced Markdown rendering system to improve content readability
Built robust user authentication system using Firebase
Managed complex application state with Redux
responsibilities: Developed and maintained React-based web applications with Redux state management
Implemented user authentication and data persistence using Firebase
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement responsive web applications
Enhanced content display by implementing advanced Markdown rendering capabilities
achievements: Improved user experience by developing an enhanced Markdown rendering system
Successfully implemented and maintained secure user authentication flow
Established efficient state management patterns using Redux

work.name: Song Tea
work.summary: Provided excellent customer service at a to-go bubble tea shop, handling all aspects of beverage preparation and customer interactions.
highlights: Prepared high-quality bubble tea beverages according to customer specifications
Delivered exceptional customer service in a fast-paced to-go environment
Maintained cleanliness and organization of work station and equipment
responsibilities: Greeted and assisted customers with menu selections and special requests
Prepared various bubble tea drinks including fruit teas, milk teas, and specialty beverages
Operated point-of-sale system for order processing and payment handling
Maintained inventory of ingredients and supplies
achievements: Consistently maintained high customer satisfaction in busy to-go environment
Mastered preparation of diverse menu items efficiently

work.name: New Kims Wei Restaurant
work.summary: Performed multiple roles in a busy restaurant environment including cashier duties, phone orders, food packaging, front desk operations, and kitchen assistance.
highlights: Successfully managed multiple responsibilities across front-of-house and kitchen operations
Handled customer transactions and phone orders with accuracy and efficiency
Supported kitchen operations including food preparation and frying duties
responsibilities: Operated cash register and processed customer payments accurately
Answered phone calls and took customer orders for takeout and delivery
Packaged food orders ensuring proper presentation and completeness
Managed front desk operations and greeted customers
Assisted with kitchen duties including frying and food preparation
achievements: Developed strong multitasking abilities while maintaining quality service
Gained comprehensive restaurant operation experience across multiple departments

certificates.name: CS50's Introduction to Programming with Python
CS50's Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python

projects.name: GameBoyJS
projects.description: A modern JavaScript implementation of a Game Boy emulator built for the web using ES6+ features, designed as a comprehensive learning project to understand computer architecture and emulation principles.
highlights: Architected a complete Game Boy CPU emulator using modern ES6 JavaScript with modular design patterns
Implemented accurate instruction set emulation including registers, memory management, and timing cycles
Developed comprehensive PPU (Picture Processing Unit) for authentic graphics rendering and sprite handling
Created detailed technical documentation and tutorial articles explaining emulation concepts and implementation details
Built from scratch to understand low-level computer architecture, memory mapping, and hardware emulation principles
Ongoing development project focusing on accuracy, performance optimization, and educational value

projects.name: Svg2SvgIcon Converter
projects.description: A pure client-side online tool that converts SVG code or files into Material-UI (MUI) SvgIcon components ready for use in React projects, featuring real-time preview and intelligent parsing capabilities.
highlights: Developed a React-based converter with Material-UI components for seamless SVG to MUI SvgIcon transformation
Implemented intelligent viewBox parsing that automatically detects existing viewBox attributes or generates them from width/height properties
Created a real-time viewBox controller with live preview, allowing precise adjustment of icon viewport and cropping
Built comprehensive SVG parsing engine supporting nested elements, inline styles, and complex SVG structures
Integrated error handling system with collapsible console and visual error indicators for enhanced user experience
Ensured complete client-side processing for maximum privacy and security without server data transmission

projects.name: BetterBaruch Toolbox Website
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of utilities designed specifically for the Baruch College community, presented through an engaging, interactive web interface.
highlights: Developed a modern web application using React and Vite for optimized performance and enhanced developer experience
Created an interactive 3D model of the Baruch Bearcat mascot using Three.js with custom animations and dynamic lighting effects
Engineered a responsive design system that delivers a consistent experience across desktop and mobile devices
Implemented a modular architecture allowing for seamless integration of new tools and easy maintenance
Incorporated efficient routing and state management for a smooth single-page application experience
Optimized 3D rendering performance through advanced techniques including texture compression and level-of-detail management

projects.name: BetterBaruch - DegreeWorks Helper
projects.description: A browser extension that enhances the Baruch College website experience by adding useful features and improvements for students navigating academic resources.
highlights: Engineered a cross-browser extension using vanilla JavaScript for Chrome and Edge platforms
Implemented a serverless backend architecture with Express.js deployed on AWS Lambda for scalability
Successfully published and actively maintaining the extension on the Chrome Web Store with regular updates
Enhanced student website usability through feature additions including improved navigation, information display, and workflow optimizations

projects.name: BetterBaruch - Rally Nexus
projects.description: A comprehensive mobile application designed to enhance the Baruch College student experience by providing centralized access to campus clubs and events information through an intuitive interface.
highlights: Engineered a React Native mobile application that streamlines navigation of Baruch University's student organizations and campus activities
Designed a scalable NestJS backend with serverless architecture using AWS Lambda and DynamoDB for efficient data management
Developed an automated web scraper using Puppeteer to extract and synchronize real-time club information from official university sources
Integrated RSS feed technology to deliver up-to-date campus events directly to users' mobile devices
Established a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions for automated builds and releases triggered by version tags
Created a responsive UI that delivers a consistent experience across different mobile devices and screen sizes

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills, built with modern web technologies for optimal performance and user experience.
highlights: Leveraged Astro framework and TailwindCSS to create a high-performance static website with minimal JavaScript
Implemented responsive design principles ensuring seamless experience across all device sizes
Integrated dark mode support with persistent user preferences and smooth transitions
Designed interactive project showcases with engaging animations and comprehensive skills visualization

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: A technical blog platform for sharing in-depth programming insights, tutorials, and development experiences with the broader tech community.
highlights: Leveraged Hexo framework for efficient static site generation and optimal loading performance
Authored comprehensive technical articles and step-by-step tutorials on various programming topics
Implemented custom theme modifications and functionality extensions to enhance reader experience
Established automated content deployment workflows and maintenance processes for consistent publishing

projects.name: HP Instant Ink Calculator
projects.description: A user-friendly web tool designed to help users determine the most cost-effective HP Instant Ink subscription plan based on their specific printing needs and usage patterns.
highlights: Developed a responsive React-based calculator that determines the most economical HP Instant Ink plan based on page volume
Implemented bilingual support with seamless switching between English and Chinese interfaces
Created a transparent cost breakdown showing base costs, extra page fees, and total expenses for all available plans
Built with client-side processing ensuring calculations are performed locally without sending sensitive data to servers
Designed with a clean, intuitive UI that highlights the recommended plan for easy decision-making

projects.name: Kaspersky To 1Password
projects.description: A specialized web utility for converting TXT exports from Kaspersky Password Manager into CSV format compatible with 1Password and other password management solutions.
highlights: Implemented client-side file processing architecture ensuring all sensitive data remains local for maximum security
Developed with React and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, intuitive user interface across devices
Engineered comprehensive Unicode character support including CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) text handling
Created robust UTF-8 encoding for CSV outputs ensuring compatibility with multiple password manager import systems

projects.name: Hexo-Theme-Ares
projects.description: A feature-rich, highly customizable theme for the Hexo blogging platform that enhances content presentation with advanced functionality and internationalization support.
highlights: Developed a modern theme architecture using Pug templating engine and JavaScript for flexibility and performance
Implemented lightning-fast local search functionality with keyword highlighting and result previews
Integrated syntax highlighting for code blocks with customizable styling and line numbering
Built native support for Mermaid diagrams enabling complex visualizations within blog posts
Engineered comprehensive internationalization support with multi-language content management
Incorporated Disqus commenting system and Google Analytics with privacy-conscious loading options

projects.name: Shopping-Nest
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built to explore and document the complete development process, serving as both a practical implementation and educational resource.
highlights: Architected a comprehensive e-commerce solution with React and TailwindCSS frontend, NestJS and MySQL backend
Implemented secure user authentication, product catalog management, and interactive shopping cart functionality
Designed and developed RESTful APIs with proper validation and established secure database connections
Documented the entire development journey through detailed technical blog posts for educational purposes

projects.name: Hotaru.TS
projects.description: A Discord-inspired full-stack real-time chat application built as a learning project to explore modern web technologies and architecture patterns.
highlights: Architected a comprehensive chat platform with React frontend and NestJS backend utilizing TypeScript
Implemented real-time message delivery using Socket.io with optimized event handling and state management
Designed a scalable data persistence layer using MongoDB for message and user information storage
Integrated secure file sharing capabilities through MinIO object storage with proper access controls
Developed a robust authentication system with JWT tokens and role-based authorization
